law.catch_line: The Department may not accept articles of reinstatement for record unless:...
law.text:
The Department may not accept articles of reinstatement for record unless:
All annual reports required to be filed by the limited liability company or which would have been required if the right to do business in Maryland had not been forfeited are filed; and
Unemployment insurance contributions or reimbursement payments, all State and local taxes, except taxes on real estate, and all interest and penalties due by the limited liability company or which would have become due if the right to do business had not been forfeited are paid, whether or not barred by limitations.
